${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you change the constructor of your card to use super(cardInfo, true); this will be the card's description when it is upgraded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
${modID}:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: If you have no Block, deal !D! damage.

${modID}:BattleReady.NAME: Battle Ready
${modID}:BattleReady.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of all attacks in your hand to 0 this combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BloodLust.NAME: Blood Lust
${modID}:BloodLust.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, gain !M! Strength. NL At the start of your turn, lose 1 Strength.

${modID}:Dominate.NAME: Dominate
${modID}:Dominate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Feint.NAME: Feint
${modID}:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GoldenArmor.NAME: Golden Armor
${modID}:GoldenArmor.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Dexterity. NL Gain !M! Plated Armor.

${modID}:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
${modID}:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is Exhausted, Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:IronWill.NAME: Iron Will
${modID}:IronWill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each card in your Exhaust pile.
${modID}:IronWill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each card in your Exhaust pile +3.

${modID}:LoseControl.NAME: Lose Control
${modID}:LoseControl.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add !M! copies of *Dazed to your hand. NL Draw 1 card.
